rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)

Flow.description: This version contains market segment related condition and assignments. Contains condition and assignments related to Service opportunity referral program.

formulas.name: SetOppProjectDescription
formulas.expression: if(len( {!$Record.Lead_Submitter__c} )=0,"",BR() & "Info submitted by: " & {!$Record.Lead_Submitter__c} & " on " & text( {!$Record.Lead_Submit_Date__c} ) & BR()) & if(len( {!$Record.Lead_Project_Description__c} )=0,"", "Project description: " & {!$Record.Lead_Project_Description__c} & BR() & BR()) & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Stage__c})=0,"","Project stage: " & {!$Record.Lead_Stage__c} & BR()) & if(len(text( {!$Record.Lead_Production_Date__c}))=0,"","Dates: " & if(len(text( {!$Record.Lead_Proto_Date__c}))=0,"","prototypes: " & text( {!$Record.Lead_Proto_Date__c}) & "; ") & "start production: " & text( {!$Record.Lead_Production_Date__c} ) & BR()) & if({!$Record.Lead_Planned_Qty__c}=0,"","Planned annual quantity: " & text( {!$Record.Lead_Planned_Qty__c}) & br()) & /* kept for Leads created before Opp Product launch */ if(len({!$Record.Lead_GPS_Product__c})=0,"","GPS Product: " & {!$Record.Lead_GPS_Product__c} & "; ") & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Wireless_Product__c})=0,"","Wireless Product: " & {!$Record.Lead_Wireless_Product__c} & "; ") & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Wireless_Product__c})=0,"",br()) & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Products_Of_Interest__c})=0,"","Products of interest: " & {!$Record.Lead_Products_Of_Interest__c} & ";" & BR()) & if(len({!$Record.Lead_End_Customer__c})=0,"","End customer: " & {!$Record.Lead_End_Customer__c} & ", " & {!$Record.Lead_End_Customer_Country__c} & "; ") & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Design_House__c})=0,"","Design-house: " & {!$Record.Lead_Design_House__c} & ", " & {!$Record.Lead_Design_House_Country__c} & "; ") & if(len({!$Record.Lead_CM__c})=0,"","Manufacturing: " & {!$Record.Lead_CM__c} & ", " & {!$Record.Lead_CM_Country__c} ) & br() & /* kept for Leads created before Opp Product launch */ if(len({!$Record.Lead_Current_GPS_Qty__c})=0,"","Current annual GPS quantity: " & {!$Record.Lead_Current_GPS_Qty__c} & BR()) & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Current_Qty__c})=0,"","Current annual quantity: " & {!$Record.Lead_Current_Qty__c} & BR()) & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Current_GPS_Supplier__c} )=0,"","Current GPS supplier: " & {!$Record.Lead_Current_GPS_Supplier__c} & BR()) & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Current_Suppliers__c})=0,"","Current suppliers: " & {!$Record.Lead_Current_Suppliers__c} & BR()) & if(len({!$Record.Lead_Current_Wireless_Qty__c})=0,"","Current annual wireless quantity: " & {!$Record.Lead_Current_Wireless_Qty__c} & BR()) & if(len( {!$Record.Lead_Current_Wireless_Supplier__c} )=0,"","Current wireless supplier: " & {!$Record.Lead_Current_Wireless_Supplier__c} & BR()) & if(len( {!$Record.Lead_Submitter__c} )=0,"","Project information submitted by: " & {!$Record.Lead_Submitter__c} & BR()) & if(len( {!$Record.Lead_Request__c} )=0,"",BR() & "Request: " & {!$Record.Lead_Request__c}) & if(len( {!$Record.Lead_uB_Contact__c} )=0,"", BR() & "u-blox contact: " & {!$Record.Lead_uB_Contact__c})

Flow.label: Opportunity: Before Update/Insert Processes
